name: Manish Sharma
position: Software Engineer @Microsoft | Ex: UrbanCompany |  IIT Kanpur
about: I am a graduate of IIT Kanpur and for the past two years, I have been working as a Software Engineer at Urban Company, a leading home services platform in India. In this role, I have been involved in designing, developing, and deploying scalable and reliable solutions using AWS, Node.js, Kubernetes, Docker, and other technologies. I have also contributed to improving the user experience, performance, and security of the platform. I enjoy working with a talented and diverse team of engineers, and I am always eager to learn new skills and technologies. My goal is to apply my knowledge and skills to create innovative and impactful products that solve real-world problems.

current_company.name: Microsoft
current_company.title: Software Engineer @Microsoft | Ex: UrbanCompany |  IIT Kanpur

experience.title: Full stack summer Intern, IITK Summer of Code'19
experience.description: Developed a web app from scratch which can work completely as a library portal with a team of 5 members. Technologies used were Django Rest framework, React Js and SQLite.
